titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Southeast Asia Collection, Yale University, Records
Southeast Asia Collection, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:06

did.unittitle: Southeast Asia Collection, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of memoranda, correspondence, reports, and lists documenting the Southeast Asia Collection at Yale University Library.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 32-D (YRG 32-D), Records of Yale school and departmental libraries and collections.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Copyright for materials authored or otherwise produced as official business of Yale University is retained by Yale University. Copyright status for other collection materials is unknown. Transmission or reproduction of materials protected by U.S. Copyright Law (Title 17, U.S.C.) beyond that allowed by fair use requires the written permission of the copyright owners. Works not in the public domain cannot be commercially exploited without permission of the copyright owners. Responsibility for any use rests exclusively with the user.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Southeast Asia Collection, Yale University, Records (RU 713). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Yale University records are arranged and described at the accession level by the creating office. The University Archives creates collection level descriptive records, but typically does no further arrangement and description at the accession level.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of memoranda, correspondence, reports, and lists documenting the Southeast Asia Collection at Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged alphabetically by topic.

Libraries -- Special collections

did.unittitle: University Library Collection Development South East Asia Collection

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: No online inventory available. Paper inventory available in repository.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
